brand.name: Mobile Paws Grooming Van
brand.tagline: We Come to You ‚Ä¢ Full Salon on Wheels

hero.title: Professional grooming at your door
hero.subtitle: Full-service dog grooming in our custom salon van. We bring everything to your driveway - no stressful car rides. One dog at a time for focused, calm grooming. Book your convenient mobile grooming today!

about.title: Grooming Comes to You
about.subtitle: Full salon on wheels
about.content: Mobile Paws brings professional grooming right to your driveway. Our climate-controlled van has everything a traditional salon has - bathing station, grooming table, and all professional equipment. Perfect for anxious dogs, senior pets, or busy families!

products.name: Full Mobile Groom
products.description: Complete grooming service at your door. Bath, haircut, nails, ears. One-on-one attention in our van.

products.name: Mobile Bath & Brush
products.description: Refreshing bath, blow dry, and brush out. We come to you! No car ride stress for your pup.

products.name: Senior Dog Mobile Groom
products.description: Extra-gentle grooming at your home. Perfect for senior dogs who struggle with travel. Comfort-focused.

products.name: Anxious Dog Package
products.description: Calm, patient grooming for nervous dogs. One-on-one attention. Familiar environment helps reduce stress.

products.name: De-Shedding Treatment
products.description: Special treatment to remove loose fur. Dramatically reduce shedding. Add to any mobile groom.

products.name: Multi-Dog Discount
products.description: Two dogs groomed back-to-back at your home. Save $20! Perfect for multi-dog households.

items.text: Game changer! My anxious dog hated going to the groomer. Now they come to us and she's so much calmer. The convenience is amazing and she looks great!
items.author: Rachel Kim
items.title: Anxious Dog Mom

items.text: Perfect for our senior lab who has trouble getting in the car. The groomer is so gentle and patient. Worth every penny for the convenience and care!
items.author: Tom Wilson
items.title: Senior Dog Dad

items.text: We have three dogs and getting them all to the groomer was a nightmare. Mobile Paws does all three in our driveway. So convenient and they all look amazing!
items.author: Maria Garcia
items.title: Multi-Dog Household

members.name: Jake Morrison
members.title: Owner & Mobile Groomer
members.bio: 10+ years grooming experience. Built Mobile Paws to provide convenient, stress-free grooming for dogs who struggle with traditional salons. Every dog deserves calm, patient care.
